data.text:
Today, during our internal training workshop, we explored the importance of understanding your purpose in life, work and the community. How we can create an individual purpose statement that inspires and drives us in what we do? Developing an individual purpose comes from understanding the overarching sense of what really matters in life. We experience purpose when we strive or work towards something that is personally meaningful or valuable to us. Our individual purpose is interlinked with our personal brand. It is what drives us to turn our aspirations into goals, and our goals into achievements. My purpose is 'To Ignite the spark and passion of life-long learning while embracing our difference. Supporting dreams in becoming realities.' What's your purpose? Share below and let's get inspired! ğŸ”¥ #purpose #serviceprofessionals #lifelonglearning

At ETSI, we believe that workshops should be more than just a lecture. They should be memorable experiences that captivate, educate, and empower. Here's how we do it: We infuse creativity into every workshop by crafting unique themes that foster teamwork and problem-solving. Our goal is for learners to absorb information by actively participating in solving puzzles, conquering challenges, and working together as a team. ğŸ¯ Why Theme Your Workshops? âœ¨Captivate Learners: Themes grab your learners' attention from the get-go, making learning more exciting. ğŸ¤Foster Teamwork: Themed workshops encourage collaboration and strengthen team dynamics. ğŸ§©Enhance Problem-Solving: Puzzles and games challenge your learners' problem-solving skills in a fun way. ğŸ§  Boost Retention: Memorable themes make the learning experience stick in their minds long after the workshop ends. Remember, the key is to tailor your theme to your workshop's objectives and audience. When you do, you'll create an educational experience that captivates, educates, and empowers. Ready to make your workshops unforgettable? Contact us today to explore how ETSI can theme your training sessions for maximum engagement and impact. ğŸ“ğŸ’¼ #TrainingTipTuesday #WeAreETSI #WorkshopThemes #InteractiveLearning #Teamwork

Announcing the launch of CommPassion for you!ğŸ“¢ğŸ‰ Since 2011, CommPassion has been bringing advanced communication techniques to private businesses and public sector organisations, helping employees to collaborate more effectively. And now we are pleased to announce that we will be bringing this training to you! CommPassion for you is a series of online courses for individuals, to help boost your communication skills, build better relationships with your partner, children, family, friends, at school, college, home, in your workplace, in everyday life. CommPassion for you courses teach you how to use the MECAnismÂ® as a tool for a deeper understanding of yourself, how you interact with others in various situations, how you can resolve your own mind chatter and how you can give yourself the self-empathy we all need so much. Our courses will teach you how to truly listen to others and be able to empathise with them, even when a situation has left you feeling hurt, sad or angry. And with these skills, they will teach you to have a more connected conversation, to say what you really want to say, and say it with kindness for the other; a conversation that will lead to more effective solutions that will give you what you, and others, want and need. Teaching you The Human Language, and bringing you more self-confidence, self-connection, connection with others, and peace of mind. Sign up to be the first to hear when our courses are launched using the Linktree in our bio â€“ the first one will be free! #TheHumanLanguage #commpassion #CommPassionforyou #masterclasses #courses #learning #teaching #onlinecourses #launch #announcement #communication #wellbeing #individual #personalwellbeing #personaldevelopment #personalgrowth #family #nonviolentcommunication #compassion #selfcompassion #understanding #development #inclusion #diversity

ğŸ“£ Our 'Experience First' promotion has been extended! Which means you can participate in one of our learning workshops at absolutely no cost. We firmly believe in the value these workshops offer and want to provide everyone with the opportunity to experience them firsthand, without any financial commitment. This is your chance to experience our unique teaching style, which we are confident you will appreciate just as much as our dedicated clients. Here's how it works: Simply visit our website at www.wise-training.uk, explore our different workshops, and choose the one that captures your interest. Whether you're looking to learn something new or enhance your existing skills, our diverse selection caters to everyone. And the best part? There are no obligations or fees involved! We are certain that this promotion will showcase the quality of our approach and empower you to select from our extensive range of courses. If you would like more details about our 'Experience First' promotion or have inquiries regarding other training options, please do not hesitate to contact us at nicola@wise-training.uk. #learninganddevelopment #personaldevelopment #professionaldevelopment #workplacetraining
